verse: अथ यदि सखिलोककामो भवति संकल्पादेवास्य सखायः समुत्तिष्ठन्ति तेन सखिलोकेन संपन्नो महीयते॥

terms.सखिलोककामो (sakhilokakamo): one who desires popularity among people
terms.संकल्पादेवास्य (sankalpadevasya): through the power of determination or resolve
terms.सखिलोकेन (sakhilokena): by the popularity of those people

meaning: Meaning:Now, if someone desires popularity among people and through the power of their determination, their friends stand up for them, then that person is honored or considered great by the popularity of those people.
